title: Brolls
description: Point of Sales and Customer Queueing for the food stall, Brolls.

title: Amy Little Shop
description: Affiliate marketing website with a collection of products from shopee and lazada. Feel free to purchase items here.

title: Recipom
description: This is a Recipe App where it obtains data from an external API. Users are able to search, view,favorite and unfavorite a Recipe after logging in.

title: Egg Wrecker
description: This is a simple web based game programmed in Javascript. It's let's its players to set coordinates to attack and destroy the eggs planted by chickens

title: Contacts Master
description: This is a contacts management application. Callers will be able to record their contacts and mark them accordingly depending on the contacts insterest

title: Circumsession
description: This is Free Circumsission Booking web application for men. They can book a schedule at the comfort of their home to avoid falling in line.

title: Coastal Real Estate Academy
description: This is a Real Estate School Website. It aims to obtain aspiring realtors to be educated in this institution

title: Coffee Head
description: This is a small Coffee Shop Website in Baguio City. Created for a friend

title: Noble Trends Unbound, Inc.
description: This is a small BPO company website. It currently holds insurance and sales campaigns

title: Evalumentor
description: This app is used to evaluate mentors or teachers or supervisors. It will generate a calculated copy of all evaluations of a certain mentor

title: RESQ
description: Abbreviated as Response Emergency System Query. This application was created during the 3-day hackaton and it can help responders track users based on their location so an appropriate responding team will be sent
